features: Perfectly Powerful: Experience unparalleled power with our handheld steamer, boasting an impressive 1875 W of power. Our Super Turbo level provides more steam output, while also offering a heat-up time that's 44% faster than traditional handheld steamers.
Rapid Heat Up: Say goodbye to morning rush with our always ready steamer. It's ready to use in just 25 seconds, ensuring you can quickly and effortlessly steam your clothes without any delays.

Multi Purpose Performance: Enjoy the benefits of steam power that goes beyond wrinkle removal. Our steamer refreshes, sanitizes, and eliminates odors from various textiles, clothes, home fabrics and more.

Convenience is Key: Our steamer delivers 10 minutes of autonomy, so you have plenty of time to tackle multiple garments or larger items. Plus, the 9.84-ft power cord provides extended reach for added flexibility.
body.description: Enjoy powerful, fast and efficient steam day after day with Rowenta X-cel Steam Force, the most powerful handheld steamer (by Rowenta) for efficient dewrinkling results on a wide range of fabrics. Boasting 1875W of power and continuous steam on demand, it ensures excellent results, with reduced steam flow on Delicate level and 28 g/min on Super Turbo level. A cast aluminum heating plate with dark ceramic coating provides better results than ever, while a ultra quick heat-up of just 25 seconds which is 44% fatser than previous models. Thanks to the steamer's heated soleplate technology, X-cel Steam Force has the perfect temperature to removes wrinkles efficiently in a single vertical movement, with no need for an ironing board - it also respects all kind of fabrics to provide you 100% safe usage on your garments. It can even be used to refresh and sanitize your home as it kills bacteria and removes bad odors . Rounding it all off are convenient features including a 6.4oz removable water tank for long steaming sessions and easy refills, as well as an extra-long 9.84 ft cord for total freedom of movement. Plus, three smart accessories provide added ease of use: a fabric brush for easy use on heavy fabrics, a steam bonnet for use on delicate fabrics and a crease attachment for perfect creases on jackets or pants.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Generates powerful steam that kills germs Kills up to 99.99% of Viruses, Bacteria and Germs with the natural power of steam to safely sanitize and refresh fabrics in your home* *External tests conducted in independent laboratories, applying the device on cotton fabric, and slowly steaming back and forth 3 times. Perfect for last minute touch ups Ready in 25 seconds! Great for all varieties of garments, perfect for last-minute touch-ups and everyday steaming needs. Convenient Convenient 6.4oz removeable water tank, steam lock and an extra-long cord length of 9.84 ft.

Compact Design For traveling and easy storage, with a self-standing base Powerful Steam Output With 1875 Watts of power and up to 28g/min of continuous steam output for fast de-wrinkling and sanitizing Versatile and Safe Easily steam horizontally as needed for larger garments, furniture, pet beds, kid’s toys and more without spitting hot water or leaking

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works well, heats up very fast

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it - doesn't spit
reviews.reviewText: I've had a variety of steamers. I use this as my home steamer. It is a bit large for travel. The great features: it doesn't spit water; it has a large reservoir for water that you can remove and refill without having to unplug the steamer; It has great steam. If you want a steamer for home, this is five stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small tank with short length time for good quality steam
reviews.reviewText: #1 I DO NOT like that the water tank can only hold a little bit of water and what makes it ridiculous is that the amount of steam is awesome but to just to steam a shirt I had to change the "LITTLE WATER TANK" 3 times. Making it time consuming. The bottom of the steamer is bulky and wide. That should have been the water tank. My first time using it was for two long curtains and it took me hours to steam them. Not a fan! Increase the size of the water tank please!#2 when holding it I keep accidentally pressing the button to stop the steam. needs a different location for that button#3. Will be awkward for people with small hands

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this steamer!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and you can get every wrinkle out very quickly with little effort. Must have!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really good steamer, but stick with the black version.
reviews.reviewText: The black steamer is an excellent and powerful product. Do be aware though that clicking on the blue or red color options in Amazon's listing, instead of the original black, don't just change the color of the product that you will receive. They are listings for a completely different and lower wattage, less adjustable and less powerful steamer. Stick with the black version and you will be a lot happier with the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars handheld steamer for clothes
reviews.reviewText: This was a gift for my daughter. When she saw it she was so happy and surprised. She said she wanted a steamer . She was very happy to receive this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not working, missing pieces
reviews.reviewText: I packed my product for a wedding. It was missing the hanging hook. Then I tried to use it and it would not work. It just spit hot water , no steam. I attempted to troubleshoot reading the pamphlet but was unable to make it work. I had to go buy a new one for the wedding because I needed it ASAP. I will be returning it without the box due to I removed it from the box to travel. I was expecting it to work and to keep it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes you presentable
reviews.reviewText: I needed a way to steam my clothes for work.Shirts and dress pants.I had a steam iron of vaguely similar design about 30 years ago in college and it worked like a champ.This is a relatively large iron, and if I'm doing several shirts and a pair of pants or two, I'll need to refill the reservoir a couple of times.It heats quickly, gets most of the wrinkles out, and is easy to use.My main gripe is that the trigger lock, which holds the steam activation trigger down for continuous steaming, is entirely too easy to knock out of place, so you have to keep resetting it.It's also pretty large. The head of this thing is like a super-big driver like you'd use on a golf course. then, beneath that, there's a handle, and finally, the base. I couldn't imagine lugging this thing with me on a trip. I'll just use the iron in the hotels.Works great otherwise, though.Oh, and the cord is quite long. Great for use, not so great for storage.
Está muy bueno, calienta muy rápido, desarruga rápido la ropa,si vale la pena comprarlo
It's the only steamer that I've ever usedSo I cannot compare it with other brands.But I really love this one.I definitely prefer using streamer over regular iron, and this model works great for me
This steamer is very powerful and easy to use. The metal plate also works like an iron it’s handy for collars or other parts that need pressing.

reviews.reviewTitle: ME ENCANTA! REALMENTE ES COMO MAGIA <3
reviews.reviewText: Cumple con todo lo que dice, realmente desarruga muy bien y muy rápido prendas que están demasiado arrugadas, y en el nivel de delicados. Con el nivel turbo las prendas de mezclina y pana, se desarrugan muy fácilmente. El vapor es intenso y continuo. Yo cuelgo la prenda en la superficie plana y sólida para facilitar la tarea. El vaporizador es un poco pesado, pero considerando su excelente funcionamiento, a mi no me molesta, solo me lo paso de una mano a otra. Cómo indica en el instructivo, esta hecho para uso doméstico, por lo que el tanque del agua es pequeño y en promedio alcanza para desarrugar de 2 a 3 prendas, dependiendo del material y el nivel de arrugado. Yo solo lo uso hasta que el tanque se vacía. Lo dejo enfrías por completo unas horas y más tarde lo vuelvo a llenar y a usar hasta vaciar, y después lo vuelvo a dejar enfríar. Cómo máximo hago esto tres veces durante un día, pero no lo uso todos los días. Lo he tenido por un par de semanas y estoy muy feliz con esta compra. En verdad se los recomiendo muchísimo. La siguiente vez que lo use tomaré una foto y/o video y lo pondré aquí.
J'aurai mis la 5eme étoile si le produit était complètement neuf mais il est arrivé un peu abimé, mais cela ne gâche pas sa fonctionnalité qui est optimale.
